transcript_chunks.text: i think kevin needs heels yeah i definitely need help i'm in the middle of five captain's on fire right now i died [ __ ] i'm sorry kevin's dead yeah i was stood in front of fire get out of the park tell me yeah you're dead you're dead don't revive them don't revive them how do you not get oh my [ __ ] [ __ ] sorry guys sorry sorry i was kevin i'm going to pick up the man because they stood in fire i stood in fire oh my god oh my god i'm on fire can't we just run through fire yeah i it wasn't on fire when i started [ __ ] me or fall apart oh damn it that fire doesn't [ __ ] around does it no it really doesn't andy what are you [ __ ] sighing about it's unbelievable it's a mechanic do you have your monitor on oh my god you're on fire again the fire on this is a simple pattern it's on and then it waits and then it goes off and then it waits [ __ ]
